summary: TAKATA RECALL    MERCEDES BENZ DOES NOT HAVE A REMEDY FOR RECALL, FOR MY CAR.   DRIVING MY CAR, HAS BEEN STRESSFUL, SINCE BEING HIT A FEW WEEKS AGO.
